thread.title: Chilling moment ‘teen girl’ clutching huge knife lunges towards young woman in vicious street brawl
thread.title_full: Chilling moment ‘teen girl’ clutching huge knife lunges towards young woman in vicious street brawl

author: gmullin
title: Chilling moment ‘teen girl’ clutching huge knife lunges towards young woman in vicious street brawl
text:
KNIFE HORROR Chilling moment ‘teen girl’ clutching huge knife lunges towards young woman in vicious street brawl 
The girl can be seen calmly walking off when passers-by rush in to break up the fight By GEMMA MULLIN 21st February 2017, 8:12 pm THIS chilling footage shows a knife-wielding teen girl lunging for another female in the middle of a busy street in broad daylight. 
The nine-second clip begins with two young women grappling with one another in the middle of a road. Facebook 2 A young girl clutching a knife can be seen lunging for another female in the middle of a busy street in broad daylight 
As the two females pull each other’s hair and throw punches, a third girl can be seen approaching from the right hand side. 
A huge knife is clearly visible in her right hand. 
The teen girl then grabs for one of the brawling women – apparently lunging for the back of her head with the massive blade. 
Passers-by rush in to break the fight up while a female voice out of shot can be heard screaming: “Oi, get the f*** off her.” RELATED STORIES BRUTAL ATTACK Slender Man stabbing girl, 15, who ‘knifed pal 19 times because character told her to’ has confession retraction REJECTED MURDER PROBE Suspect re-arrested for murder after man knifed in the street in broad daylight dies in Oxford hospital street stabbing Man rushed to hospital after being knifed outside McDonald's in central London SCHOOLBOY MURDER First picture of 16-year-old boy 'knifed in the heart' on his way home from school in street attack in Leeds SCHOOLBOY STABBING 14-year-old stabbed in Croydon is rushed to hospital after being knifed in the neck FATHER'S AGONY Dad's heartbreak at having to formally identify body of murdered seven-year-old daughter Katie Rough 
When the armed girl spots the strangers to her right, she looks at them before tucking the weapon into her jacket and calmly walking off. 
Although it is unclear when and where the footage was taken, it is believed to be in a London street and the video was uploaded to social media today. 
The video was shared on Facebook today and has already been shared more than 2,000 times in just a few hours. Two girls can be seen fighting on the ground before the third girl steps in 
We have passed the footage on to the Met Police who were unable to comment. 
The Sun Online has pledged not to show videos of bullying as part of its Block The Bullying campaign , run in partnership with the NSPCC. 
However we do not believe this footage falls into that category and have decided to run it to highlight savage knife crime that blights cities across the UK every week.
